potion.name: Potion
potion.description: Dorse protection potion. Wears off when greeter-bot cycles.

respec.name: Respec
respec.description: Clears and returns all used skill points.

pick.name: Pick of Destiny
pick.description: Play one full* song using unrelenting dark forces. (*10 minute max)

crack.name: Crack
crack.description: Smoke before your next fight to increase dmg dealt and reduce dmg taken by 10%. Or be a Good Boy and turn it in to the authorities.

bag.name: Bag of Spiders
bag.description: Throw 1-5 spiders at your foe! Spiders stack and deal dmg each turn.
bag.upgrade: Bigger bag: increase max thrown spiders by +1 per skill point! (Epic+ bags increase minimum to 2)

battleaxe.name: Battleaxe
battleaxe.description: Increases 1% dmg per 1% max hp missing!
battleaxe.upgrade: Berserker's rage: increase rage dmg bonus 0.20/0.25% per skill point!

bow.name: Bow and Arrow
bow.description: Always attacks first! Range increased during invasion.
bow.upgrade: Multishot: +7/10% chance per skill point to loose an extra arrow!

daggers.name: Twin Daggers
daggers.upgrade: Poisoned blades: 12.5/20% chance poison enemy dealing 5% max HP each turn, stacking +1 times per skill point!

fiddle.name: Fiddle
fiddle.description: Sit down in that chair right there and let me show you how it's done!
fiddle.upgrade: Demonic power: increase instakill chance +1.5/2% per skill point!
fiddle.win: He told you once, you son of a bitch, :w is the best that's ever been!

fists.name: Fists
fists.upgrade: Sucker punch: at the start of the match, hit for 40% +30/40% dmg per skill point!

kamehameha.name: Kamehameha
kamehameha.description: Sits around for 6 episodes before unleashing a devastating attack!
kamehameha.upgrade: Tank: start with +10/15 hp per skill point. Max rank: bonus hp becomes a shield!
kamehameha.win: :w triumphs over :l, but is this the end of their conflict? Find out next time...

scythe.name: Scythe
scythe.upgrade: Lifesteal: heal for 9/12% of dmg dealt per skill point!

sword.name: Sword
sword.upgrade: Parry: reflect +6/8% of dmg taken per skill point!

warhammer.name: Warhammer
warhammer.description: Hits second, requires wind-up between swings. Can 2-shot!
warhammer.upgrade: Reckless swing: gain +4/5 base dmg and recoil for +2 flat dmg per skill point!

cursedScythe.name: Cursed Scythe
cursedScythe.description: A scythe with an ancient curse...

luck.name: Luck
luck.upgrade: Don't like fighting? Increase your odds when you gamble!

rumpaws.name: Rumpaws
rumpaws.upgrade: Paws more harder and/or better to the outer limits of this world!
